content.icerik: Protecting & Hydrating Body Lotion Planell-oil in its formula supports the skin’s natural lipid layers, the anti-oxidant complex protects the skin against premature skin-aging caused by free-radicals. Shea nut butter nourishes and moisturizes the skin, Peptamide-6 increases skin firmness. This light perfumed body lotion is quickly absorbed into the skin and leaves a silky, smooth feeling.
